    level="1"
    right="Item 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dragonscale Cameo](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2102)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Morph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=113" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 93 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 400 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This ornamental pin, consisting of a single preserved dragon scale from a dragon mounted in a setting of precious metal, is typically affixed between the shoulder blades. When you Activate the pin, a pair of draconic wings matching the color of the scale unfurl from your shoulders, granting you a [fly Speed](/Rules.aspx?ID=2350) of 50 feet for 5 minutes.

**Craft Requirements** Supply one scale from an adult or older [dragon](/Traits.aspx?ID=50).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
